name: Lotto
description: A game using Phaser3 and typescript

scripts.start-boilerplate: cd src/boilerplate && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.build-boilerplate: cd src/boilerplate && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.candy-crush: cd src/games/candy-crush && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.raycasting: cd src/experimental/raycasting && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.untextured-raycaster: cd src/experimental/untextured-raycaster && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.game-of-life: cd src/experimental/game-of-life && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.point-in-polygon: cd src/experimental/point-in-polygon && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.fractal-tree: cd src/experimental/fractal-tree && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.lissajous-curve: cd src/experimental/lissajous-curve && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.procedural-generation: cd src/experimental/procedural-generation && yarn install && yarn run dev
